attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Ho-Oh.

attacks.name: Aerowing
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, you may flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, this attack does 60 damage instead.

attacks.name: Copy
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon’s attacks. Copy copies that attack. This attack does nothing if Mew doesn’t have the Energy necessary to use that attack. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) Mew performs that attack.

attacks.name: Extra Draw
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Pokémon-ex in play, search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to Mew. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Charmeleon does 10 damage to itself.

cards.name: Bill’s Maintenance
cards.effect: If you have any cards in your hand, shuffle 1 of them into your deck, then draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Rare Candy
cards.effect: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 1 or Stage 2 card that evolves from that Pokémon in your hand, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy cards attached to Pikachu.

attacks.name: Heavy Metal
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Metal Energy attached to Pikachu. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Mist
abilities.effect: Any damage done to Pelipper by attacks from Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s) is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Lightning Wing
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Detect
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Zangoose during your opponent’s next turn.

abilities.name: Purple Ray
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Espeon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s) is now Confused.

attacks.name: Psychic Boom
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Dark Ray
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Umbreon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may choose 1 card from your opponent’s hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.
